column2: You meet another Mech Suit pilot on the battlefield. The enemy is moving toward you in their Mech Suit, ready to engage. Men have stopped fighting and cleared the way to witness the impending duel...
You avoid meeting the enemy's Mech on the battlefield. This can be seen as cowardly.
Manuever your Mech Suit to meet your opponent in battle

Unfortunately, you did not have the skill to take on your opponent and their Mech Suit. Your allies manage to rescue you and tow your Mech Suit before the enemy could finish you off, but you'll need time to heal after a fight like this.
With great skill and tact, you and your Mech Suit defeat your opponent and smash their mech suit to pieces. Unfortunately, they managed to retreat with their life before you could finish them off.
